caption.title: The spatial distributions of high and low DF risk streets and the counts of daily indigenous DF cases in high and low risk streets.
caption.p: Fig 4A was generated by ArcGIS 10.0 (Environmental Systems Research Institute, RedLands, California, U.S.A). (A) High risk streets with RRs>1 and low risk streets with RRs≤1. (B) The epidemic pattern of daily accumulative dengue cases in high-risk clustering streets and the low-risk clustering streets in Guangzhou city, 2006–2014.
